title: (Tues Full Show) We Give Our Best Breakup Advice + Why Eddie Wanted To Cuss Out A Teacher + Mailbag: Listener Is Scared To Tell Husband She Lost Her Ring
itunes:title: (Tues Full Show) We Give Our Best Breakup Advice + Why Eddie Wanted To Cuss Out A Teacher + Mailbag: Listener Is Scared To Tell Husband She Lost Her Ring
description:
A listener called in who needing advice on how to get over a breakup. We go around the room and give our best tips. Plus, why Eddie saw a teacher doing something in public that made him want to cuss them out. Bobby opens the mailbag and helps a listener who lost her ring and is scared to tell her husband because she thinks he won't let her get another one. Should she tell him or buy another one without telling him?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
